name: Fire Trail Duration Reduction
author: Lejes
info: Shortens the time fire trails hang around on screen.
description: Fire Zols leave flame trails that last for about 10.66 seconds. Now they can last less horribly long.
setup: Requires std.zh. Attach this script to an FFC on any screen where Fire Zols are present. Argument D0 is the duration of the fire trails in frames (60 frames = 1 second).
